metadata.synopsis: Damays (and Nymessa) got dragged into a combat from another situation (ex.: the brains at the crash site, the bandits at the chapel). Nymessa plays this AD when the combat ends and while she returns to the cage, if Damays is dead (otherwise Damays is the one doing the AD).

0.speaker: Nymessa
0.text: It's over and done with. I've got my eye on you, toad.

1.speaker: Nymessa
1.text: Back to the toad-freak. I can't risk it escaping.
